user.title: Set up Kwatt
user.description: Enter your CIC (Customer Installation Code) to connect to your Kwatt device. The CIC must start with 'CIC-'.

pair.title: Pair with your Kwatt device
pair.description:
Please press the button on your CIC device ({cic}) now.

![Pairing button location](/local/kwatt/pair.png)

You have 60 seconds to complete the pairing.

Press 'Submit' to start the pairing process and wait for confirmation.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Kwatt API. Please check your CIC and try again.
error.invalid_cic: Invalid CIC format. CIC must start with 'CIC-'.
error.pairing_timeout: Pairing timeout. The button was not pressed within 60 seconds. Please try again.
